disclamer:
In search of guilty.
##
Clarification for blithering idiots: if you are given a dab with a spade - you should
be cross with those who's done it, but not with the inventor of a spade.  We ourselves
don't give a finger to anyone, people are given a finger to us. It's necessary to understand,
that any person in the world can use this link, because it was made this purpose. However, we
don't bear responsibility for his actions and for those insults and affronts he tried to offer
to by means of this link. as you can guess,  we are not aware of who told and was told to fuck
off with the help of our link. We are simply glad to every visitor, as though he's our welcome guest.
#
On the question of foreign affiliates.
##
Soon the addresses of our foreign affiliates will be quoted on our site. If you wish to establish an official
representation in your country on the foreign language or simply make a qualitative translation - get in touch
with us. We warn in advance, that the official representation on every language can be the only one and also
absolutely non-commercial: no banners, buttons, links and ads must be on this page- i.e. it must the exactly
the same as our page. For connection use the author's e-mail  (a smart person will find it,  for a stupid one
it's of no use).
